ygData.subject: Re: Hello
ygData.msgSnippet: I love neth lair - since my solo question, i ve done a lot of charm soloing there. Very much fun. ... Lair. ... The ... that ... EQ ... again ... hit ... so
ygData.messageBody:
I love neth lair - since my solo question, i've done a lot of charm
soloing there. Very much fun.



--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "mike_k_turner"
<michaelkturner@m...> wrote:
> Rickey,
> Good post the zone you were missing the name of is Netherbian
Lair.
> I think thats spelled right. And once you have done your time in
> Meru Seru you can head over to Dawn Shroud Peaks. You go straight
> at the big junction rather than right coming from the nexus. That
> should take you in to you mid to late 30's...If i remember right.
>
> Karudore,
> BTW, great choice of a new class for ya. I play a 65 shaman on
The
> Tribunal and i love it.
>
> --Cassdouf
> Prophet ot The Tribunal
>
>
>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Rickey" <redhawk1974@y...>
wrote:
> > welcome back.. You can get to level 7 in steam front killing
> > kobolds.. then go behind the windmills to reach level 10.. at 10
> if
> > your gear is ok.. nothing great... head over to kurns tower till
> > around 16 or 17.. then after that head over to pauladal caverns
> > <sp> good to level 24 at least.. after that go to the caverns
> > between nexus and dawn shroud peaks.<forget the name sorry>
that
> > get you to 27 maybe 28. after that go to marus saru till 30 then
> > head over to split paw till 34... thats a good way to solo
> without
> > being PLed.. But if you have LDON at level 20 try to get groups
> in
> > there.. not bad loot and great exp and fun.. Hope that helps
> some..
> > good hunting...
> >
> >
> > Rickey....
> > 56 druid
> > 38 beast lord
> > 32 mage
> > 17 ranger
>
>
>

> > --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "W" <bamafan0971@y...> wrote:
> > > I have recently (taday actually) renewed my EQ fascination
> > > (addiction?). In my previous EQ days ( I quit right after PoP
> came
> > > out) I played strictly melee characters....had a 57th lvl Barb
> > > Warrior, and a 59th lvl Hum Monk. I got tired of the endless
> > > searching for groups, and the seeming HUGE overload of really
> well
> > > equipped melees on my server (Tunare) so this time around I
> > decided
> > > to go with a high demand class, and finally, after much
> > > consideration, I decided to play the class I most loved duoing
> > with
> > > as a monk, the Shaman. I rolled up a Barb Shaman with my new
EQ
> > > Evolutions software, and -pop- there I was, back in Halas
again
> > after
> > > nearly a yeas absence. A lot of things came back to me, and
> within
> > a
> > > couple of hours, I hit lvl 5, got my new spells, and then I
hit
> a
> > > brick wall. Non of my old friends seem to be around anymore,
so
> I
> > > don't have them to ask for advice, so I turned to this group
for
> > > help. I have been told Steamfront is the best place to go to
lvl
> > up a
> > > shammy for the next few cycles anyway...any thoughts on this?
I
> am
> > > not looking to necessarily powerlevel, though I do miss the
high
> > end
> > > raiding, pulling in Kael , the 12 hour raids in HoT in ToV,
etc
> > and
> > > would like to get back to those, but I am willing to put in
the
> > time
> > > to learn this classes ins and outs, and make myself an
integral
> > part
> > > of any group I join. So any help with where to level, etc
would
> be
> > > great, since it has been since early 2001 that I was a newbie
> the
> > > first time.........and the old haunts seem to be deserted now.
I
> > do
> > > like the new transport systems, made getting out of Halas much
> > easier
> > > than it was with my warrior ( the run to Freeport with a lvl 5
> > > nightblind warrior in cloth armor was harrowing lol) ...also
if
> > > anyone has a main or an alt on Tunare that would like to group
> > with a
> > > n00b shammy and help him get the hang of it all, send a tell
to
> > > Karudore ..... see you all soon.
> > >
> > > Karudore - lvl 5 Barb n00b shammy, Tunare
> > > R.I.P.
> > > Karudor (warrior)
> > > Kerudor (monk)
> > > I miss you guys !!!!!!!!
